name: MusicSequenceLoadFlags
desc: Flags used to configure the behavior of the MusicSequenceFileLoad(_:_:_:_:) and MusicSequenceFileLoadData(_:_:_:_:) functions.

items.name: static var smf_ChannelsToTracks: MusicSequenceLoadFlags
items.desc: If this flag is set the resultant Sequence will contain a tempo track, 1 track for each MIDI Channel that is found in the SMF, 1 track for SysEx or MetaEvents - and this will be the last track in the sequence after the LoadSMFWithFlags calls.
